title: Giresunspor
text:
Giresunspor is a Turkish professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Giresun">Giresun</a>. It was founded in 1925 and re-formed in 1967 after the merger of Yeşiltepespor, Akıngençlikspor, and Beşiktaşspor. The football club is playing in the <a href="Turkcell%20Super%20League">Turkish Super League</a>). Giresunspor played in the <a href="Turkcell%20Super%20League">Turkish Super League</a> (Turkish first league) between 1971 and 1977. It was returned to top level after 44 years following defeating <a href="Tuzlaspor">Tuzlaspor</a> 2-1 at away match on 9 May 2021.
